name: Aertubbinauts
description:
This game was made for the One Button Jam.
It's a local multiplayer game. (1 - 4 Players)

You need to reach the flag [Exit] as fast as possible.

One Button Instructions

Player 1 . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . .[ SPACE ][XBOX-A]
Player 2 . . . . . [RETURN/ENTER][XBOX-A]
Player 3 . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . [SHIFT][XBOX-A]
Player 4 . . . . . . . . . . . . [CONTROL][XBOX-A]

Releasing the button let the player jumps.
Holding the button down give you after releasing more velocity.
Player automatically run when touching the floor and turn around when touching wall.

The game was made with Godot Engine.
The graphics was from kenney.nl and extended by Puppetmaster

Special thanks to Andreas Klotz (klotzedv.at) with has assisted me in programming the first time.
